message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love! I'm asking for $95 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $90 is my final price.  Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're trying to negotiate, but $89 is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
Alice, I'm willing to pay $88 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
